transcript:
Executive: The person you have called is speaking to someone else.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Awaz aati hai aapko?
Executive: Haan aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello. Ji Pradeep ji. So Pradeep ji aapko basically dekho jo sari cheeze batai gayi hai sir services wagera se related this is the thing that we are providing. Hum aapko genuine verified jo leads dekho mean kya hota hai aapka customer base hai sir. 
Executive: Theek hai aapke paas agar customer hi pehle nahi pahunchega ya customer aapke paas delayed hoga to waha pe sir kuch kuch cheeze sir inhe wo to hongi.
Executive: Ab aapka sari cheeze sir achi hai aapki visibility ko thoda sa enhance karne ki zarurat hai so that aapko aur dealing bhi achi mil jaye aur even aapka to sir dekho aapka product line kafi acha hai Pradeep ji agar dekha jaye product line kafi acha hai aur usme agar hum deal karenge to other cheeze bhi aapki hongi. Ab jaise ek BL feedback ki aapki ticket khuli hai sir. Theek hai?
Executive: Wo BL feedback ki ticket jo aapki khuli hai usko hum ek baar aap close kar denge baat to aapki ho hi gayi hai sir usme aapko bas ye hai ki main aapki sir jitni aap apni feedback dal rahe hai na aur usko aap thoda sa try kariye ki matlab feedback usko others me jaake mark kijiye.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Wo zyadatar thoda sa wo kariye. Ye to unlisted wali bhi karo.
Executive: Right and other things aap aap bataiye sir aapko services se related kuch agar doubt hai jo humne aapko jo maine aapse discuss kari sari cheeze.
Customer: Jaise ye mujhe .com wali site banani hai ki wo kaise banani hai?
Executive: Sir wo to website hai na website aapki alag hoti hai website aapko banana padega.
Customer: To wo aapki taraf se banti hai ya mujhe alag se banwani padegi? Wo isme add hogi?
Executive: Nahi sir dekho .com aapka maximizer services hai sir services aapko update karni hogi. Theek hai aapka hamari maximizer service hoti hai upgrade services wo aapko lena hoga usme aapki ye cheeze ban jati hai matlab aapka website banega ya corporate mail id khud ka own domain hoga. Ab koi bhi domain aapka jo bhi available hoga wo aapko mil jayega jaise mkengineering.com.in.co.in.net jo bhi matlab domain available hoga usme aapki dynamic four pages ki five pages ki website banti hai. Right jisme website me aapke sare aapke product wise jo bhi sari cheeze hai sare ek ek product sab kuch aapke mentioned honge sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Right sare product aapke dalenge. Right aap particularly sari jo bhi aapne dali unki alag alag photos wagera sab kuch wo deeply usme sab so that matlab main kya hoga na ki aapka main kya hota hai sir jab aapka footfall aata hai aapki profile pe. Theek hai traffic aata hai to traffic me kya hota hai sabse pehle ki aapne website to chalo bahar se bhi kahin se bana di lekin aapka traffic nahi bana. To traffic banane ke liye sir aapko kya karna padta hai traffic ke liye aapko matlab customer ko aapki website tak lana zaruri hai na tabhi to log dekhenge na.
Customer: Wahi cheez to hai wo bhi net pe nahi dikh rahi thi kisi ko dalna nahi ki bhai aapki hai kaun si site. Ispe kya hai? IndiaMART pe hai na.
Executive: Right.
Customer: Sir wo fir waha jaake dekhte hai. Kisi pe approach bhi kara to. To wahi mujhe wo jaise .com ya wo wali hai na .in .net wali wo website banani hai ek.
Executive: Wahi wahi.
Executive: To wo aapke liye better bhi hai sir agar karte ho to aapke liye acha hi hoga.
Customer: To uska kya rehta hai aapki taraf se banti hai to wo usme kitna kya hai?
Executive: Usme sir dekho aapka jo waise uska costing hai na do saal ka wo to sir dedh lakh lag deti hai do saal ka. Lekin utna aapko dena nahi hai isme aapka kya hai ki aapko Pradeep ji pehle to aapne abhi recently ye wala services karaya hai. To ye jo aapka amount hai ye amount usme aapka adjust ho jayega theek hai pura amount jo chal raha hai. Fir waha se aapka matlab jo bacha hua aapka jo bhi jaise one month aapka aapne one month ka services ho gaya to one month ka service hat ke aapka rest aapka jo ab aap jo aapne kiya hai matlab ye adjust hoke aapka maximizer service chalega aur waha fir aapka matlab jo bhi hai yaha se aapka maximizer chalega services.
Executive: Wo one month ka aapka pura jo bhi aapne paisa diya tha wo sara paisa isme adjust ho jayega remaining amount aapko thoda bahut hoga wo aapko pay karna padega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai aur usme agar abhi main dekh dekho do cheeze hai ya to aap maximizer dekh lo ya to aap abhi TrustSeal service dekh lo. TrustSeal ka logo stamp lagna sir bahut badi baat hoti hai aapki profile pe agar khud ka ek logo stamp lagta hai na to aap samjho ke ek customer hai ab bahut sare aapko aapko pata hai sir abhi customer bahut sare aise honge jinko aapka aap aapke sath matlab like ek trust build karne me dikkat ho rahi hogi. Hai na? Ki customer samne se ye soch raha hoga ki yaar mkengineering walon ko main advance payment kar du maal supply ke liye to ye mujhe pata nahi maal supply ho kyuki ek to trust market me bhi jante nahi na log sir aapko.
Customer: Wo to hai.
Executive: Right to aap kaise trust build karoge unke aage aap agar TrustSeal ka ye logo stamp laga hoga aapka jaise hallmark hai sir sona kharida to hallmark laga hota hai to aapko bharosa hota hai na ki hallmark hai. Right ki genuine sona hoga. Food product hote hai food product me FSSAI sara verified hota hai na ki ye food product verified hai. Right aise hi aapka right aise hi aapka ye wala kaam hoga sir. Right matlab aapka jab jo aapka khud ka matlab ye TrustSeal ka logo stamp lagega na usse kya hai aapka khud ka ek sir trust build hoga. Ab isme kya hai customer aapko aaram se advance payment dega customer kal ko customer ko sir ye rahega ki matlab koi bhi buyer mere sath matlab dhokhadhadi nahi kar sakta ya koi bhi supplier nahi kar sakta uske liye IndiaMART baithi hai legal team baithi hai unki.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To ye ye hota hai. Aur TrustSeal two year ka agar aap lete ho to is time pe to sir bahut hi acha offer bhi hai aapko. Matlab aapka pura aap ye laga lo agar aap aaj karte ho to aapka ye adjust ho jayega pura paisa. Aapko only aap ye khud soch ke dekho aapko jo pay karna padega 44840 sir do saal ka TrustSeal ho jayega aapka. Matlab aapko ek tarike se 38000 plus GST pay karna pad raha hai GST aapka refundable hai only 38000 do saal ke liye wo bhi TrustSeal service. Socho.
Customer: Fayda hai na sir?
Customer: Haan haan maine sun liya madam. Samajh gaya mujhe.
Executive: To sir dekho business karna hi hai business chal hi raha hai cheeze chal hi rahi hai to cheezo ko waha pe karo na sir jaha competition kam dikhe. Ab aapka ek bhi aap ek bhi sir apna keyword utha ke dekho aap dekho aapke sare competitor aapke matlab aap khud socho matlab sab ke sab competitor aapke usme aa rahe hai. Right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap khud socho sabne TrustSeal services le rakhe sare competitor aapke waha dikh rahe hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi kya madam maine ek aadhi mera product bana hai. Abhi mere ek aadh do teen product ho jayenge tab main us cheez ko karunga.
Executive: Sir to ye do teen product sir aisa thodi hai ki wo do teen product aapke add on nahi ho sakte wo do teen product to aapke kabhi bhi add on ho jayenge.
Customer: Wo to madam abhi add kar diye hai abhi karta hu main.
Executive: Haan main wahi keh rahi hu na sir wo product bhi added hai. Ab un product me aap khud socho agar aapki visibility enhance ho jaye jitne bhi aapke matlab aap khud soch ke dekho sir jitne bhi aapke basic supplier hai un sabhi basic suppliers se agar aap upar dikhoge right to aap khud soch ke dekho sir aapko kitna profit hoga. Main to sir dekho main aapko ek acha visibility wise aur sari cheeze wise aapko ye cheez sir suggest kar rahi hu kyuki aap khud samajh ke dekho sir aapke product line me na sir business acha hai. Right agar aap enhance karoge apni visibility to aapke liye acha hi rahega na kyuki wo customer aap khud socho na sir samne se customer approach hi aapko late matlab wo pahunch hi nahi pa rahe sir aapse pehle bahut sare customer aapke jo competitor hai wo sab log usko consume kar le rahe hai buyleads.
Customer: Right?
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Sir achi cheeze hai isko karaiye usme kyu apna nuksan kar rahe hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Right koi aur agar hai kuch baat chal rahi hai dimag me kuch matlab kuch budget wagera to bataiye khul ke.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi abhi abhi aisa kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi aisa kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai chal raha hai to thoda sa abhi kaam thoda sa alag tarike se karna padega.
Executive: Sir kaam dekho sahi time pe sahi cheez pe adjust karna bhi to kaam hi hai na sir. Aap agar sahi time pe aap khud soch ke dekho sir agar aap aap us din ka wait karoge aap khud socho aap keh rahe ho ki main theek hai main matlab dekhta hu main baad me karaunga ab baad me aap khud socho sir jo customer char market me baithe hue hai ab wo char log aapse upar already baithe hai TrustSeal me theek hai ab jab aap aap char mahine baad aap sochoge ki main unki jagah aana chahu to wo already wo char log bhi to upar jayenge na to matlab position to wahi ki wahi reh rahi hai na. Right wo char log bhi to apni visibility enhance karne ke liye upar jayenge. To main aapko bas wahi bolna chahti hu sir wait mat kijiye aap khud socho na sir Paytm aaya market me jab covid ka usne kya wait kiya ki covid aayega tab main launch hounga usne sahi time pe sahi chauka mara na wahi aapko karna hai mkengineering ko market me visibility banane ke liye sahi time pe aana zaruri hai na. Competitor to bahut baithe hai sir. Right?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: To ab aap bataiye agar aapke upar hai to sir dekho sari cheeze ab to.
Customer: Theek hai madam. Sir main do char din me soch ke aapko jawab is madam ko main bhej sakta hu.
Executive: Sir do char din ka wait hi kyu kar rahe hai abhi adjustment ho raha hai to abhi kara lijiye adjustment baad me to sir fir nahi hoga na pura ka pura.
Customer: Kaise?
Executive: Adjustment hai sir jo aapka paise ka pura adjustment.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Hmm. Main keh rahi hu sir ki aap uska matlab wait mat kijiye na aap ye ye likhiye ki abhi matlab aapka pura paisa adjust ho raha hai. Ab kyuki ek mahina aapke profile ko ho chuka hai sir ab pura paisa adjust nahi hoga na.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Hmm. To aap abhi kara lo aaj agar aaj bhi main dekhti hu sir try karti hu agar aapka pura paisa ek tarike se sir aapne abhi tak jo lagaya hai wo pura paisa adjust ho jayega to fayda hi hai na aapka.
Customer: Okay. Chalo madam main baat karke batata hu MD se ye cheez.
Executive: Aap ek baar thoda sa discuss kar lo main aapko ek baar do teen baje tak call kar leti hu bata do agar karna hai to sir dekho main bhi approval le leti hu agar adjust ho jayega pura paisa to kara lo abhi aapko 38000 hi to pay karna pad raha hai wo bhi sir ye socho pura do saal ke liye TrustSeal chalega aapka.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Hai na fayda hai sir isliye bol rahi hu kyuki usme buylead bhi badhegi na aapki 34 buylead ho jayengi bahut sari cheeze hai. Aap abhi dekho aap sir aap khud socho aap apna mota mota 40 50000 ka nuksan kara rahe ho just because of ek matlab kuch matlab 30 40 matlab 10 20000 ke liye. Aap hi wo matlab aap khud socho na 38000 zyada better hai na aapke wo kal ko 50000 60000 kam bhi to ho raha hai nuksan bhi to aapka matlab bach hi raha hai na paisa to kal ko bhi aapko ye services maan lo aap lo kal ko same services ka sir aapko wahi aapko 120000 pay karna pad raha hai TrustSeal ke liye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Right. Ab wo cheez abhi kitne me ho rahi hai 38000 wo bhi do saal to fayda hi hua na sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi mujhe na kuch dino baad India ka nahi export ke liye lena hai isme India ke liye.
Executive: Export dekho sir export bhi zaruri hai lekin export ko banne ke liye aap ek baat batao pata hai kyu sir export service bhi agar aap chalaoge maan li chalo aapki baat lekin aap basic plan ke sath export chala ke kya fayda aap thoda sa ek hamara TrustSeal services loge to aapka India me bhi to visibility hona chahiye agar maan lo koi export ka client hai bahar se jo aapko dekh raha hai to wo bhi to aapka IndiaMART ka pura sari cheeze dekhega na waha pe bhi to TrustSeal ka logo stamp sab kuch dekhega na wo to usko ye bhi to trust hoga na ki India me itna popular hai mkengineering tabhi to export me deal kar paoge na easily.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir dekho Pradeep ji bharosa rakhiye aapka paisa meri jeb me nahi ja raha. Mera koi fayda nuksan nahi hai isme. Main aapko bas ye bata rahi hu kyuki kal ko aap mere hi customer bane rahoge to main aapko sahi cheeze suggest karungi main bhi aapko sir 6 mahine baad saal bhar baad dobara agar koi cheez ke liye bolungi sir saal bhar baad aap abhi TrustSeal le rahe ho maan lo aaj saal bhar baad main bolungi sir ab aap ye services karao uske sath ye cheeze benefit hai to aap apne account manager ka sir agar suggestion loge to aap grow hi karoge business me main khud 10 saalo se hu sir yaha pe. Main aapko ye bata sakti hu ki sir jitne bhi mere customers hai aaj bhi mere ko call karke paisa dete hai ki haan Sanna ji ye cheez hai ye cheeze karaye kya ye better rahega main haan suggest karti hu jo cheez achi hai achi hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Paisa mat dekho sir aap itna paisa itna paisa sir aapne lagaya hi hai 20 30000 zyada socho mat is cheez ko aur business ke liye hi hai sir nuksan nahi ho raha fayda hi ho raha hai isme.
Customer: Samajh rahe hai?
Customer: Theek hai haan.
Executive: Main aapko dobara karti hu ek baar bataiye mujhe do teen baje tak jaisa bhi ho theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai. Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to create a .com website.

- Customer wants export services in the future.

- Customer is hesitant about the cost.



Resolution:

- Executive explained maximizer and TrustSeal services.

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal for export.

- Executive offered to adjust current amount to TrustSeal.

- Executive offered to call back at 2-3 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with MD and inform executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, website, maximizer, export, visibility
